entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers at times heavy or flurries beginning early in the afternoon then changing to flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
